channel.title: I need help with fallenscape that i downloaded!
channel.description:
hi.... i downloaded the source of fallenscape so i can make my own copy of it but im actualy new to all this and i need massive help :)
ok heres what i need help with.....
how to make people admin and mods how to change the ip address from 0.0.0.0 when i start it to my ip and how to change the starter kit....like change the amount of money and also how to add the codes like ::dragon and stuff but with different name
i know how to make admins and mods on testscape but not this :(

item.title: I need help with fallenscape that i downloaded!
item.dc:creator: @Java_Ownz_U Java Ownz U
item.description:
@Java_Ownz_U wrote:

IP is suposed to be 0.0.0.0 That is Local Host…

Change Player right to 1-2-3-4 in Character folder --> Character name txt file.

1 - Mod
2 - Admin
3- Owner
4 - Invisible Admin

Starter kid is in Client.java search for whatever you get when you start (item id) forget what is is near in client.java sorry, change to whatever you want.

Commands.

Search for “noclip” and scroll up and down to see others looking like “dragon” change to what you want and also change items given by changing the ID.

Read full topic
item.source: I need help with fallenscape that i downloaded!
